DOC.detailed_description: Randomized multicenter clinical trial two parallel group . Patients major depression ( unipolar bipolar ) , remit electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) eligible . All patient receive pharmacotherapy ( venlafaxine target dose 300mg/day , lithium target dose 0,5-0,8 mmol/L ) . The intervention continuation unilateral ECT weekly first 6 week thereafter every 2 week one year . Depressive relapse primary outcome measure .
